analysis.description:
BasicToken.balances (/unique_chucks/9/0xb6d5414a1550b70d3a1280081b115fddc4a465d2.sol#49) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/9/0xb6d5414a1550b70d3a1280081b115fddc4a465d2.sol#84-117)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/9/0xb6d5414a1550b70d3a1280081b115fddc4a465d2.sol#131-142)
	- mint (/unique_chucks/9/0xb6d5414a1550b70d3a1280081b115fddc4a465d2.sol#305-324)

HoneyMiningToken.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0xb6d5414a1550b70d3a1280081b115fddc4a465d2.sol#424-471) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,tokens.add(refTokens)) (/unique_chucks/9/0xb6d5414a1550b70d3a1280081b115fddc4a465d2.sol#442-443)
	-token.mint(referrer,refTokens) (/unique_chucks/9/0xb6d5414a1550b70d3a1280081b115fddc4a465d2.sol#446-448)
	-token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/9/0xb6d5414a1550b70d3a1280081b115fddc4a465d2.sol#462-463)
	-token.mint(owner,devTokens) (/unique_chucks/9/0xb6d5414a1550b70d3a1280081b115fddc4a465d2.sol#468-469)
